Description.Text: At the Hilton Garden Inn Valencia Six Flags hotel you'll find everything right where you need it including complimentary high-speed Internet access. The Hilton Garden Inn Valencia hotel is the best Valencia hotel for business or leisure travel to suit every budget that includes valued price family style atmosphere and great service. This modernized Valencia hotel has all new features to equip every personality in mind. you won't even need to leave the grounds to have an amazing experience. Some of the many great amenities offered to all of our guests here at the Hilton Garden Inn Valencia Six Flags hotel include The Great American Grill Neutrogena Bathroom Amenities Complimentary Workout Facility USA Today each Weekday Morning Outdoor Heated Pool and Whirlpool Refrigerator Microwave and Coffee Maker Evening Room Service and On-Site Catering 24-Hour Pavilion Pantry Convenience Mart We offer great space and services for groups and meetings at our Valencia hotel. The Hilton Garden Inn Valencia Six Flags hotel has 2 500 square feet of meeting and banquet space with an outdoor courtyard. This Valencia hotel has a complimentary 24-hour business center and complimentary high-speed wireless Internet service in all of our 152 guest rooms and throughout the lobby. Oversized work desks along with a Herman Miller Mirra chair are available in each room as well as PrinterOn Remote Printing for your convenience. Come enjoy our hospitality that Hilton Garden Inn is known for.

Located in the heart of the Valencia/Santa Clarita valley this beautiful Valencia hotel is the only Hilton Garden Inn closest to Six Flags Hurricane Harbor and Six Flags Magic Mountain. The Hilton Garden Inn Valencia is around the corner to some of the most coveted golf courses and world famous sites and attractions. We are minutes away from the Valencia Gateway's fastest growing businesses that include Technology Aerospace Education BioMed and Entertainment clusters in Los Angeles County.

Great American Grill - The Great American Grill is known for their Chefs great cuisine and nightly specials. On the list of favorites are The Classic Cheeseburgers steak salmon classic club sandwiches dinner is served from 5 pm to 10 pm nightly. You can also enjoy an evening c. Pavilion Pantry - For those nights where you just want a quick bite head down to the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry convenience mart which is something you definitely won*t find at other hotels in Valencia.
